cwe.Description: This weakness has been deprecated.  It was poorly described and difficult to distinguish from other entries.  It was also inappropriate to assign a separate ID solely because of domain-specific considerations.  Its closest equivalent is CWE-1023.

xhtml:p: Use for Mapping: Prohibited (this CWE ID must not be used to map to real-world vulnerabilities).
Rationale: This CWE has been deprecated.
Comments: see description for suggestions of other CWEs to consider.

Modification.Modification_Comment: updated Common_Consequences, Demonstrative_Examples, Description, Detection_Factors, Name, Relationships, Time_of_Introduction, Type
